name: Southern Lights
description: Southern Lights, formerly known as White Star, from Delta 9 Labs takes NYC Diesel and adds just a touch of earthy indica flavor from Sensi Star to the mix. The cerebral sativa effects are led by a pungent, fruity musk that invigorates and uplifts the senses. The elevated head buzz is eventually displaced by relaxing body effects, an attribute that can be enhanced by extending the flowering cycle beyond 11 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Southern Lights, formerly known as White Star, from Delta 9 Labs takes NYC Diesel and adds just a touch of earthy indica flavor from Sensi Star to the mix. The cerebral sativa effects are led by a pungent, fruity musk that invigorates and uplifts the senses. The elevated head buzz is eventually displaced by relaxing body effects, an attribute that can be enhanced by extending the flowering cycle beyond 11 weeks.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Stephen Hawking Kush, Boy Scout Cookies, Southern Lights, Cinderella's Dream, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
From genius-inspired Kushes to classic Cookie hybrids, we've got more than enough strains to recommend this week from our new additions. Did you know you can submit suggestions for missing strains by downloading the Leafly app? Just search for the strain, and if no results show, click the email link to send us a message with your request!
Go forth, explore, and if you happen to cross paths with any of these new strains, leave a review sharing your thoughts. (But wait — there's more! Many other new strains lie waiting for you in Leafly's Explorer — go see for yourself.)
 
   1. Stephen Hawking Kush
Characteristics of Stephen Hawking Kush:

High-CBD indica strain
Cross between Harle-Tsu and Sin City Kush
Cherry, berry, and minty flavors
Relaxing and hungry effects

 
   2. Boy Scout Cookies
Characteristics of Boy Scout Cookies:

Hybrid strain
Bred from GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) genetics
Sweet, earthy, woody flavors
Euphoric, calm, and happy effects that taper down into a foggy daze

 
   3. Southern Lights
Characteristics of Southern Lights:

Mostly sativa strain
Cross between NYC Diesel and Sensi Star
Pungent fruity and musky flavors
Cerebral-focused, uplifting effects followed by full-body relaxation

 
   4. Cinderella's Dream
Characteristics of Cinderella's Dream:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cinderella 99 and Blue Dream
Skunky, lemon, and citrus flavors
Cerebral activity that gives an energetic burst

 
   5. Madzilla
Characteristics of Madzilla:

Mostly indica strain
Cross between King Louis XIII and Skywalker
Sweet pine aroma with an earthy, floral taste
Full-body effects calm the mind and relax sore muscles and body pains

 
   6. Ringo's Gift
Characteristics of Ringo's Gift:

High-CBD hybrid strain
Cross between Harle-Tsu and ACDC
Mellow mix of cerebral activity and soothing full-body relaxation

 
   7. Fortune Cookies
Characteristics of Fortune Cookies:

Hybrid strain
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and OG Kush
Earthy, honey flavor
Soaring, long-lasting buzz perfect for creative escapes

 
   8. Cabbage Patch
Characteristics of Cabbage Patch:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cherry Pie and Durban Poison
Sweet, earthy, and fruity flavors
Uplifting, social, creative effects

 
   9. Violet Delight
Characteristics of Violet Delight:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Unknown genetics
Flowery, violet flavor
Clear-headed, focused, meditative effects

 
   10. White Cheese
Characteristics of White Cheese:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cheese, Super Skunk, and Afghani
Skunky, cheese, earthy flavors
Relaxing but functional stress-relieving effects
